participants.name: Erick Falconi
participants.title: Technical Recruiter at Atrilogy Solutions Group

messages.message:
Hey Brian,

I wanted to connect and possibly work together now or down the road. You seem like you know your stuff and would appreciate having you as a resource. 

Cheers,
Erick Falconi

Hey Brian,

Just wanted to say thanks for the connection, I really do appreciate it. 

Saw you might be looking for something new and wanted to reach out. I feel most people are always "keeping an eye out" for something special, but was curious what your current situation looks like and what's next for you?

Thanks again for the connection,
-Erick Falconi
